item.title: AMAT
item.description: score:-10 Chances: The semiconductor market is expected to grow by double digits in 2024. Demand for processors is clearly strong and rising. A jump in semiconductor equipment spending could supercharge Applied Materials. The collaboration with Google on AR technologies shows potential for product development and enhanced capabilities.
